name: consulta_dados_societ_rios
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool consulta_cpf_cnpj_brasil.
Tool description: api consulta cpf cnpj diretamente na base do serasa, otimize suas aplicações
API description: Fetches the data of a partner (socio) associated with the given socioeconomic ID (id_socio).

id_socio.description: The socioeconomic ID of the partner to be queried.
